pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, August 29, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, August 29, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

7:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Mrs. Grégoire Trudeau will depart for Beijing, People’s Republic of China.

Canada Reception Center
Hangar 11
190 Convair Private,
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 6:15 a.m.
  • Photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
